import React from 'react' class ModalEdit extends React.Component { constructor(props){ super(props) this.state={ errors: [], first_name: '', last_name: '', phone: '', facebook: '', twitter: '', github: '', website: '', skill: [], subject : '', } } handleInputChange = (event) => { this.setState({ [event.target.name]: event.target.value, errors: [], }) } render(){ return ( <>
Edit Your Profile

{ this.state.errors['last_name'] && {this.state.errors['last_name']} }
{ this.state.errors['phone'] && {this.state.errors['phone']} }

{ this.state.errors['twitter'] && {this.state.errors['twitter']} }

{ this.state.errors['website'] && {this.state.errors['website']} }
) } } export default ModalEdit;
